parameters.name: Comment
parameters.description: The description of the public key. The description can be up to 500 characters in length.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host on which you want to create a public key for the user.

> You can call the [listinstances](~~204522~~) operation to query the ID of the bastion host.

parameters.name: PublicKey
parameters.description: The public key. Encode the value by using the Base64 algorithm.

parameters.name: PublicKeyName
parameters.description: The name of the public key.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
Specifies the region ID of the bastion host on which you want to create a public key for the user.

> For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the user for whom you want to create a public key.
